version.description: Version number of the schema to validate against (i.e. this document)

workflow.description: The root object that describes the workflow

id.description: The unique identifier for the workflow.

class.description: The workflow class. Determines what storage class and scheduler to use.

meta.description: Abitrary metadata that you may use to describe the workflow

initialActions.description: Array of initial actions for the workflow. At least one must be specified to set the first step and perform any other functions and checks.

steps.description: The steps of the flow. Any workflow must have at least two steps.
